Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total expenses of a project must not exceed the allocated budget.

Name: team_size_constraint
Description: A development team must have a size between 3 and 9 members, according to Scrum guidelines.

Name: worker_skill_requirement
Description: A worker assigned to a task should possess the necessary skills for that task.

Name: fixed_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint (end_date - start_date) must be constant and not exceed a predefined value (e.g., 4 weeks).

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: The sum of effort from tasks assigned to a worker must not exceed their availability.

Name: single_po_per_backlog
Description: Each Product Backlog must be managed by exactly one Product Owner.

Name: sprint_backlog_effort_cap
Description: The total estimated effort of all user stories in a Sprint Backlog should not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: task_dependency_precedence
Description: If a task is blocked by another, the blocking task must be completed first.

Name: project_deadline_compliance
Description: The project's end date must not be later than the stakeholder-agreed deadline.

Name: mandatory_feature_documentation
Description: A feature marked as critical must have a corresponding and complete feature documentation.

Name: user_story_points_required
Description: All user stories selected for a sprint must have an estimated value for story_points.

Name: scrum_master_is_certified
Description: The assigned Scrum Master should ideally be certified.

Name: stakeholder_influence_check
Description: Stakeholders with high influence must be included in the Sprint Review.
